lead_paragraph: STEINBERG--Roslyn, of Elmhurst, age 21+. Died at home, surrounded by family, on June 24, 2016. Adored wife of the late Richard Steinberg. Cherished mother of Michael and Victoria. Beloved mother-in-law of Margaret and grandmother of Shauna. Daughter of the late Eli and Pearl Yellin. Sister of the late Fay Goldstein, Ann Savage, and Jack and Sylvia Yellin. Treasured aunt, great-aunt and friend. Services, Tuesday, June 28, 2016 at noon, Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapel, 114-03 Queens Boulevard, Forest Hills. 1/3
